description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hear ye! Hear ye! Role players come forth! Why spend the expense of 10 dollars for a new set of dice when you can get your very own cool-looking digital dice here at XBOX live Indie games for just A DOLLAR! No longer need to carry any dice around. Loose all worries of wearing any dice out. It's ten times less expensive!
